data.description: As Lister tries to cope with the loss of his arm, Kryten searches for his nanobots (microscopic robots) to get them to rebuild the arm. In Lister's laundry basket, he finds out who stole Red Dwarf, and the ship is returned in all its glory. Except for one small thing...                Written byWalsh (R-DBP)

donation.message: Please, donate to keep this service alive and help its further development
